version_description:
- Get acquainted with our brand new Experts!
- Usability improvements, and general game beautification!
- Polish and bug fixes!

- Preparations for upcoming events and exciting new features
- New recognizable experts for later stages
- Ongoing bug fixes and graphical polish

- Prepping for exciting new events!
- Improved matchmaking!
- Bug fixes and improvements!
- Support for updated iPad Pro

Which of the following is included in the latest version of Who Wants To Be a Millionaire?
A: Bug squashes!
B: Performances enhancements!
C: Visual Improvements!
D: All of the above!

We hope your final answer was D - because you'd be right?

We're working up to some really fun new features, so stay tuned!

Our Holiday Update Is LIVE! T’is the season to be a Millionaire!

- Completing certain events will grant you rewards to decorate your avatar! Show off your smarts!
- Look out for some amazing limited time deals over the Holiday Season!
- New Events!
- Optimizations, visual improvements and bug fixes!

We're working hard for our discerning Millionaires!
- Improved league reward payouts, they will no longer be delayed
- Experts have received training and now know the answers to questions about themselves
- Experts cool down timers are now shown in the expert panel
- Preparations for upcoming events and new features which will be released in the coming weeks
- Bug fixes, performance improvements, and polish

- Performance and visual improvements!
- Quality of game-life improvements!
- Prepping for a new event!
- Bug fixes!
Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? is now available in German!

Hello Millionaires! It's ho ho holiday time!  We've been toiling away in our workshop to bring this finely crafted upate to you!  We have a very special expert for you who only appears once a year.  From our team of experts to yours...we wish you a happy holiday and an excellent start to your new year!  Thanks for playing!
Ahoy Millionaires! Arrr you ready for our new update?  There's a new expert that wants to join your crew... can you guess who?  We've just given you a few hints!  Thanks for playing!
Hello Millionaires! We're adding more experts, running more events and implementing improvements all the time... just for you!  Thank you for playing!
Our newest release includes a pot o’ gold’s worth of updates, including our St. Patrick’s Day event! May the luck of the Irish be with you!
The game will now default to your spoken language on devices running iOS 12.
Our newest release includes a pot o’ gold’s worth of updates, including our St. Patrick’s Day event! May the luck of the Irish be with you!

Thank you for playing Who Wants To Be a Millionaire!
Recruit the Easter Bunny to your team of Experts during our Easter Expert Event! Look out for sales and themed items to customize your profile as well!
Recruit the Easter Bunny to your team of Experts during our Easter Expert Event!  Look out for sales and themed items to customize your profile as well!

Hello Millionaires!  In this update, your tour of the world continues with a brand new level - welcome to South Africa!  New Experts await, just hoping to join your team.  We hope you enjoy it!  Thank you for playing!
Hello Millionaires! April showers bring May updates.  This update brings new events and a new special expert to add to your roster!  We hope you enjoy them.  Thank you for playing!

NEW FEATURE: Milestone Maker
Save Your Spot!
Now once you beat your opponent you can use the Milestone Maker to save your place on the ladder!
Use the flag powerup found in the top left corner to mark your spot, if you answer a question wrong you'll only fall to the position you chose on the ladder!

NEW EVENT: Independence Day Expert Event
Hello Millionaires! We're adding more experts, running more events and implementing improvements all the time... just for you!  Thank you for playing!
Hello Millionaires! We're adding more experts, running more events and implementing improvements all the time... just for you! Thank you for playing!

Ahoy Millionaires! Arrr you ready for our new update?  There's a new expert that wants to join your crew... can you guess who?  We've just given you a few hints!  Thanks for playing!

Hello Millionaires!  A million scares await you, our loyal fangs, in this Halloween update!  Right off the bat, our new spooky expert will offer you a deal you count refuse! Can you guess who it is?  Thanks for playing!

Hello Millionaires! As the harvest season approaches, so too does our latest update! We're serving a heaping plate of improvements and a cornucopia of new experts!  Just our little way of giving thanks!

Hello Millionaires! It's ho ho holiday time!  We've been toiling away in our workshop to bring this finely crafted upate to you!  We have a very special expert for you who only appears once a year.  From our team of experts to yours...we wish you a happy holiday and an excellent start to your new year!  Thanks for playing!

Hello Millionaires!  It's our first big update of 2020 - we're bringing you new events and a whole slew of new experts, as well as improving the stability and look of our game!  We hope you're as excited as we are! Thank you for playing!

Hello Millionaires!  It's our first big update of 2020 - we're bringing you new events and a whole slew of new experts, as well as improving the stability and look of our game!  We hope you're as excited as we are! Thank you for playing!

Hello Millionaires!  A nice big update to start March off right!  New experts are coming your way, as well as a new event.  A special little bunny might make an appearance as well!  Thanks for playing!

Hello Millionaires!  A nice big update to start March off right!  New experts are coming your way, as well as a new event.  A special little bunny might make an appearance as well!  Thanks for playing!
Hello Millionaires! A nice big update to start March off right! New experts are coming your way, as well as a new event. A special little bunny might make an appearance as well! Thanks for playing!

Welcome back, Millionaires!  We're back with more experts, more events and more fun! You may have already noticed our additional language support - we are so excited to bring Latin Spanish to the game!  You can change game language in the settings menu.  Thank you for playing!
Welcome Back, Millionaires!  There's never been a better time to brush up on your general knowledge! This update brings new Events, new Experts and more of the game you love.  Thanks for playing!

Hello Millionaires!  Summer is in the air, and new Experts, Events and Deals are in this latest version of the game! We'll celebrate Father's Day, and we'll set the stage for America's Independence Day!  Thanks for playing!
Hello Millionaires!  We're back and excited to offer you even more new experts to fill your roster, as well as new events and opportunities to win! Thank you for playing!
Hello Millionaires!  We're back and excited to offer you even more new experts to fill your roster, as well as new events and opportunities to win! Thank you for playing!
Welcome back, Millionaires!  The scariest season is upon us, and with it, this terrifyingly great update!  New Experts, new events and new ways to win!  Thanks for playing!
Welcome back, Millionaires!  The scariest season is upon us, and with it, this terrifyingly great update!  New Experts, new events and new ways to win!  Thanks for playing!

Welcome back, Millionaires! We are so excited to announce that our game is now available in Hindi! We also have some new
events and other fun features for you to explore. Thank you for playing!

events and other fun features for you to explore. Thank you for playing!

events and other fun features for you to explore. Thank you for playing!
Welcome back, Millionaires!  The winter months are upon us, but we're not putting a freeze on fun!  New Events, New Rewards and New Experts have arrived in our latest update!  Thank you for playing!
Welcome Back, Millionaires!  Question: What will you find in the newest version? A: New Experts B: New Events C: Bug Fixes D: All of The Above! If you said D, you are correct!  Thank you for playing!
